Reviews.Title: “Great location and nice rooms”
Reviews.Author: ReviewbyLaura
Reviews.Content: looking comfortable frills hotel centre rome hotel garda 2 minute walk spanish steps close main attractions rome accommodation located 4th 5th floors 18th century building lift hotel dont carry luggage stairs hotel basic comprising reception lounge tiny breakfast breakfast served basic nice comprising croissants cornetti italian jam tarts cereals juice coffee comfortable modernly decorated including ensuite bathroom spotless definitely stay hotel location value money
